title: Beefburgers with bacon and cheese
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '450g (1lb) beef mince', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon tomato sauce or ketchup', 'salt to taste', '8 slices unsmoked back bacon', '8 slices cheese', '4 sesame seed buns', 'extra tomato sauce for top of burgers']
